review: I was a bit skeptical at first.  A small USB device didn't seem like it could be fast and responsive. Plus my TV already had the amazon and netflix apps - so I figured why would I need another device?The stick itself is super easy to setup.  It automatically updates when you plug it in and shows an intro video to explain stuff.  It's extremely fast and responsive.  Selecting videos to play works surprisingly fast on wifi and has little to no lag.  The interface is light-years ahead of the included apps in my tv.  This allows you to search for movies, tv shows automatically play the next episode, and it has a screensaver turn on incase you fall asleep.I don't have many grips at all. It would be nice if Netflix was considered a "native" app, as in I didn't have to install it before using it.  But other than that I couldn't be happier.
